遍.definition: everywhere; all over; classifier for actions: one time

遍地開花.definition: (idiom) to blossom everywhere; to spring up all over the place; to flourish on a large scale

遍布.definition: to cover the whole (area); to be found throughout

遍歷.definition: to traverse; to travel throughout; (math.) ergodic

遍體鱗傷.definition: (idiom) covered all over with cuts and bruises; beaten black and blue
